some zucchini and some lemon thinly

half moons basically what you're doing

getting when you're cooking them
papillote is basically a whole meal with

it's a one packet meal

third of the dill a tablespoon then

ounce filet of salmon place that on top
season with salt and pepper squeeze a

near the lemon juice and the dill and
the butter will all meld together to

then comes the unpacking of the UM

Halfmoon shape it's a classic shape but

and the fish is
